de.mpg.biochem.mars.molecule

Interface MoleculeArchiveWindow


  • public interface MoleculeArchiveWindow
    This interface must be implemented by Mars GUIs that provide MoleculeArchive windows with access to archive information. mars-swing and mars-fx both contain concrete implementations of this interface.

    This provides direct access to the MoleculeArchive window that is currently displaying the archive contents using the getWindow method. Using this interface the window can be updated, locked, unlocked, closed, Log Messages can be printed to the lock mode background and the Progress of a running job can be provided.

    Author:
    Karl Duderstadt

    • Method Detail

      • update

        @Deprecated
void update()
        Deprecated. 
        Force the window to refresh its components. Deprecated - lock/unlock could also be used to force a reset or type casting if needed.

      • setProgress

        void setProgress(double progress)
        This is used to report the progress for a long running task working on the archive when its locked. This should be a value between 0 and 1 with 1 representing completion.
        Parameters:
        progress - Fraction of job that is complete.

      • updateLockMessage

        void updateLockMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Update the message presented on the lock screen.
        Parameters:
        message - Message presented on the lock screen.

      • addLogMessage

        @Deprecated
void addLogMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Deprecated. 
        Add a message to the log that is presented in the background of the lock screen. All log messages sent to the method logln(String message) are printed to the lock screen background using this method.
        Parameters:
        message - String message to add to the lock screen log background.

      • log

        void log(java.lang.String message)
        Add a message to the log that is presented in the background of the lock screen. All log messages sent to the method addLogMessage(String message) are printed to the lock screen background using this method.
        Parameters:
        message - String message to add to the lock screen log background.

      • logln

        void logln(java.lang.String message)
        Add a message and start a new line in the log that is presented in the background of the lock screen. All log messages sent to the method addLogMessage(String message) are printed to the lock screen background using this method.
        Parameters:
        message - String message to add to the lock screen log background.

      • lock

        void lock(java.lang.String message)
        Lock the MoleculeArchive window to prevent changes from being made at the same time as calculations are running on the archive. Allow for setting a specific message in the lock screen such as the calculation that is currently running.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to present in the lock screen.

      • lock

        void lock()
        Lock the MoleculeArchive window to prevent changes from being made at the same time as calculations are running on the archive.

      • unlock

        void unlock()
        Unlock the MoleculeArchive window once processing is complete.

      • close

        @Deprecated
void close()
        Deprecated. 
        Close the archive window. Deprecated - archive windows should be closed directly. If this is required typecasting could be used.
